item.title: 康斯伯格第一季度利润因国防系统需求而飙升
item.description: 挪威防务设备制造商康斯伯格集团（Kongsberg Gruppen）周四公布，受导弹和防空系统等需求的推动，第一季度核心利润增长了81%。【原文：Norwegian defence equipment maker Kongsberg Gruppen reported an 81% higher first-quarter core profit on Thursday, driven by demand for its missiles and air defence systems among others.】

item.title: 啤酒酿造商百威英博公布第一季度利润超过预期两倍
item.description: 安海斯-布希英博（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周四公布第一季度营业利润增长 7.9%，远高于分析师预计的 3.1%。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev on Thursday reported a 7.9% rise in first-quarter operating profit, well ahead of analyst estimates for 3.1% growth.】

item.title: Tripledot 以 8 亿美元收购 AppLovin 的移动游戏组合
item.description: 移动游戏开发商 Tripledot Studios 周四表示，已同意以约 8 亿美元的现金和股票收购营销平台 AppLovin 的移动游戏工作室组合。【原文：Mobile game developer Tripledot Studios said on Thursday it has agreed to buy marketing platform AppLovin's mobile games studio portfolio for about $800 million in cash and stock.】

item.title: 受关税影响，丰田全年利润下降 21
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税压力和日元升值使强劲的混合动力需求失去了一些光彩，丰田汽车公司周四预测本财年利润将下降21%。【原文：Toyota Motor forecast a 21% profit decline for the current financial year on Thursday, as the strain from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and an appreciating yen take some of the shine off strong hybrid demand.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 正在洽谈聘请高级管理人员担任主要领导职务的事宜
item.description: 据《The Information》周四援引熟悉该计划的人士的话报道，OpenAI 正在与一名高级技术主管进行谈判，以便在这家人工智能公司的一次重大领导层重组中监管公司的一些部门。【原文：OpenAI is in talks with a senior technology executive to oversee some of the company's divisions in a major leadership restructuring at the artificial intelligence firm, The Information reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：PIMCO 认为美国经济衰退风险加剧
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 表示，美国经济衰退的风险达到了多年来的最高点，投资者错误地判断了唐纳德-特朗普总统征收高额关税的决心。【原文：U.S. bond giant PIMCO said recession risks in the country are at their highest in years and that investors are misjudging President Donald Trump's resolve to enforce steep tariffs.】

item.title: 早间新闻武装冲突肆虐，但贸易战有望解冻
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 澳大利亚交易所提出 IPO 改革方案以重振上市活力
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）周四公布了一系列改革建议，旨在增强澳大利亚资本市场的全球吸引力，重振其低迷的首次公开募股（IPO）环境。【原文：The Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) on Thursday unveiled a series of proposed reforms aimed at enhancing the global appeal of Australia's capital markets and revitalising its subdued initial public offering (IPO) landscape.】

item.title: 市场衰退指标：从噪音中剖析信号
item.description: 全球经济衰退的风险重新回到了市场的担忧名单上，但从经济数据和主要金融指标来看，情况并不像表面上那么一目了然。【原文：Global recession risks have shot back up markets' worry list, but the readout from economic data and key financial indicators is not as clear cut as it first appears.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税，中国4月出口可能大幅放缓
item.description: 4 月份，中国的出口增长可能大幅放缓，原因是特朗普征收关税以及世界上最大的两个经济体能否达成协议缓解贸易紧张局势的不确定性抑制了对美国的出货量。【原文：China's export growth likely slowed significantly in April, as shipments to the United States were dampened by Trump's tariffs and uncertainty over whether the world's two largest economies can strike a deal to ease the trade tensions.】

item.title: 股市因贸易协议有望达成而走强，美元试图守住美联储会议后的反弹势头
item.description: 周四，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在其全球关税战中提出第一份贸易协议后，亚洲股市走强，而美元则试图守住隔夜涨幅，因为市场排除了近期降息的可能性。【原文：Shares in Asia firmed on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump flagged a first trade deal in his global tariff war, while the dollar tried to hold overnight gains as markets pushed out the chance of near-term rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行因全球贸易变化而调整市场，盈利持平
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）周四公布的上半年现金收益基本持平，原因是竞争给利润率带来压力，减值的增加抵消了贷款的增长。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group reported largely flat first-half cash earnings on Thursday as competition pressured margins and a rise in impairments offset lending growth, while flagging that market activity is likely to realign due to global trade risks.】

item.title: 纽约时报》称美英将于周四宣布贸易协议
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周三援引三位熟悉计划的人士的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将于周四宣布美国与英国之间的贸易协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to announce a trade deal between the United States and Britain on Thursday, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing three people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 美联储发出不急于降息的信号后，美元处于领先地位
item.description: 美联储警告通胀和失业率上升给经济带来的风险正在上升，美元兑欧元汇率继一天前创下两周来最大涨幅后，周四持稳。【原文：The U.S. dollar held steady against the euro on Thursday following its biggest rise in two weeks a day earlier, when the Federal Reserve warned of rising risks to the economy from higher inflation and unemployment.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔表示从未寻求与任何总统会面
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，他从未寻求与任何一位美国总统会面，即使有过这样的会面，那也是因为当选领导人寻求互动。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said on Wednesday that he never seeks to meet with any U.S. president and to the extent he has had such a meeting, it's because the elected leader sought the interaction.】

item.title: 经济不确定性和供应担忧拖累油价，油价下跌后持稳
item.description: 由于全球两大石油消费国美国和中国之间贸易谈判结果的不确定性影响了投资者情绪，油价在上一交易日下跌超过1美元后于周四企稳。【原文：Oil prices steadied on Thursday after falling more than $1 in the previous session as uncertainty over the outcome of trade talks between the U.S. and China, the world's two largest oil consumers, weighed on investor sentiment.】

item.title: 苹果要求美国上诉法院暂停对 Epic Games 案件的裁决
item.description: 苹果公司已要求联邦上诉法院暂时中止美国法官裁决中的关键条款，该裁决命令这家科技公司立即开放其利润丰厚的应用程序商店，以迎接更多的竞争。【原文：Apple has asked a federal appeals court to temporarily pause key provisions in a U.S. judge’s ruling that ordered the tech company to immediately open its lucrative App Store to more competition.】

item.title: 阿波罗旗下阿斯彭保险在美国首次公开募股中融资 3.975 亿美元
item.description: Aspen Insurance 周三在纽约的首次公开募股定价在市场预期范围内，为这家总部位于百慕大的专业保险公司筹集了 3.975 亿美元。【原文：Aspen Insurance priced its New York initial public offering within its marketed range on Wednesday, raising $397.5 million for the Bermuda-based specialty insurer.】

item.title: 波音公司官员建议新空军一号喷气机的交付日期为 2027 年
item.description: 美国空军一名官员周三表示，波音公司已提议在2027年交付其推迟交付的新版空军一号。【原文：Boeing has proposed delivering its delayed new version of Air Force One in 2027, a U.S. Air Force official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 白宫称美国已制定主权财富基金计划，但尚未做出最终决定
item.description: 白宫发言人周三表示，美国财政部和商务部已经制定了主权财富基金计划，但尚未做出最终决定。【原文：The U.S. Treasury and Commerce departments have formulated plans for a sovereign wealth fund but no final decisions have been made, a White House spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 穆迪警告私人信贷零售风险上升带来的风险
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）评级机构周三警告称，将资金投入私人信贷资产的散户投资者对美国经济构成的风险正在上升。【原文：Moody's ratings agency warned on Wednesday of the rising risk that retail investors, who put their money into private credit assets, pose to the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 英国央行将降息，因担心特朗普关税的影响
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策对世界经济造成了压力，英国央行周四将继续缓慢降息，投资者将关注是否有迹象表明英国央行可能很快加快降息步伐。【原文：The Bank of England is poised to extend its slow run of interest rate cuts on Thursday with investors watching for any signs that it could soon pick up the pace as U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs weigh on the world economy.】

item.title: AMC 娱乐公司因影院上座率下降而收入减少
item.description: AMC Entertainment 周三公布第一季度收入下降了 9.3%，原因是好莱坞电影公司大片上映减少导致其电影院上座率下降。【原文：AMC Entertainment on Wednesday reported a 9.3% fall in first-quarter revenue, as fewer blockbuster releases from Hollywood studios led to reduced attendance at its movie theaters.】

item.title: 据 TechCrunch 报道，特斯拉的 "Robotaxi "商标因过于通用而被驳回
item.description: 据 TechCrunch 周三援引一份文件报道，美国专利商标局拒绝了特斯拉为其汽车申请 "Robotaxi "商标的尝试。【原文：The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office has refused Tesla's attempt to trademark the term "Robotaxi" in reference to its vehicles, TechCrunch reported on Wednesday, citing a filing.】

item.title: 微软敦促参议员加快人工智能许可审批，促进政府数据访问
item.description: 根据路透社看到的书面证词，微软总裁布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）周四将敦促美国立法者简化联邦对人工智能能源需求的许可，并开放更多的政府数据集用于人工智能训练。【原文：Microsoft President Brad Smith on Thursday will urge U.S. lawmakers to streamline federal permitting for artificial intelligence energy needs and open more government data sets for AI training, according to written testimony seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，谷歌全球业务部门裁员约 200 人
item.description: 据 The Information 周三援引知情人士的话报道，谷歌周二在其负责销售和合作的全球业务部门裁员约 200 人。【原文：Google on Tuesday cut about 200 employees across its global business unit, which is responsible for sales and partnerships, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing a person with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第一季度净利润下降 2%，但超出预期
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周四公布，第一季度净利润同比下降2%，这是自2022年第一季度以来的首次下降，主要原因是实施15%的全球最低税率导致税收支出增加。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, posted on Thursday a 2% fall in net profit in the first quarter from a year earlier, the first drop since the first quarter of 2022, mainly due to higher tax expenses from implementation of the 15% global minimum tax.】

item.title: 软件供应商称，黑客攻击后，美国学区面临勒索企图
item.description: 美国教育软件和云服务提供商 PowerSchool 周三发表声明称，黑客试图利用之前从该公司窃取的数据敲诈美国 "多个 "学区。【原文：Hackers have tried to extort "multiple" school districts in the United States using previously stolen data from education software and cloud provider PowerSchool, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西央行将利率上调至近 20 年新高，下一步行动尚未确定
item.description: 巴西央行周三连续第六次加息，将利率上调 50 个基点，将借贷成本推升至近 20 年来的最高点。【原文：Brazil's central bank raised interest rates by 50 basis points on Wednesday in a sixth straight hike that pushed borrowing costs to their highest in nearly 20 years, and left future steps open amid global uncertainties and sticky domestic inflation.】

item.title: 美国法官将于 5 月 14 日前就美国原住民反对的力拓铜矿项目做出裁决
item.description: 一名美国联邦法官表示，他将在 5 月 14 日前就是否阻止特朗普政府将亚利桑那州的土地转让给力拓和必和必拓，以建造一座遭到美国原住民反对的大型铜矿做出裁决。【原文：A U.S. federal judge said he will rule by May 14 on whether to block the Trump administration from transferring Arizona land to Rio Tinto and BHP to build a major copper mine opposed by Native Americans.】
